home_about.subtitle: OUR STORY
home_about.desc: With years of experience, Be4Best blends modern design concepts with traditional craftsmanship. We don't just manufacture furniture; we design timeless pieces that add soul to your living spaces, combining comfort and elegance.

global_map.title: From Kayseri to the World
global_map.subtitle: With our domestic production strength and international logistics network, we carry our quality across continents.

story.title: A Success Story in the Furniture Sector
story.p1: Succeeding to become a leading company in the furniture sector with years of experience, Be4Best is among Turkey's respected brands with its product variety, design differences, and quality understanding.
story.p2: With a consumer-oriented approach, reflecting the sector's needs and expectations in the best way, our company constantly improves all production processes by anticipating new trends in home decoration.

values.mission_desc: To create and produce world-class, human and environmentally friendly products suitable for different lifestyles through our R&D activities.
values.vision_desc: To continuously raise the bar in product quality by following technological developments and taking firm steps towards becoming a world brand.
values.quality_desc: With the slogan 'Efficiency and Customer Satisfaction', our policy is to meet demands economically, reliably, and on time.

ceo.title: Message from the CEO
ceo.quote: Furniture production is not just a job for us; it is a way of thinking and acting with precision. Welcome to our family. We serve the whole world and do our best for you.
ceo.name: Mr. Nuri
